raw_text: DIAS BANDARANAIKE,​ LAKSHMI (nee JAYASUNDARA). Loving wife of the LATE Hon. Felix Dias Bandaranaike,​ and loving mother of Christine. mother in law of Avindra Rodrigo and grandmother of Chalya and Jaana. Loving sister of late Manel de Alwis,​ Nissanka (Noj) Jayasundera,​ Malkanthie Wikramanayaka,​ and Indrani Hewitt,​ passed away at home peacefully. Viewing at home,​ on Sunday,​ 27 August 10 am,​ funeral arrangements to be notified.053874

EGODAGE INDRANI (SAMARANAYAKE) – Beloved wife of late Siripala Egodage,​ loving mother of Chaminda (Australia) and Samitha (Army Hospital),​ grandmother of Manuga,​ mother-in-law of Madhavee,​ sister of late Bharatha,​ late Chitrani,​ Pushpa,​ Ranjith,​ Nandene and Nalini,​ passed away. Cortege leaves residence for cremation at 5 p.m. at Niyandagala Cemetery on Saturday 26th. No. 7,​ Vidarshana Mawatha,​ Galavilawatte,​ Homagama.053750

STAVE – JOHN – Beloved husband of Kumari,​ everloving father of late Jakola,​ Angelo,​ Nicola (Australia),​ Jessica,​ Jacqulina,​ Camy and Shervon,​ father-in-law of Stella,​ Chamika (Australia),​ Suresh and Rohan,​ grandfather of Dorian,​ Ethan (Australia),​ Hayden,​ Nathan (Australia),​ Brandan (Australia),​ Sophia,​ Callan and Calliope,​ son of the late Tony and Gertrude Stave,​ brother of Arlene (Australia),​ Susan (Australia),​ Felician,​ Ingrid and Gereard,​ brother-in-law of Keiran (Australia),​ Travis (Australia),​ late Luckshmi. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour. Cortege leaves A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour at 4.00 p.m. on Saturday the 26th August for Burial at General Cemetery Borella. (Roman Catholic Section).053221
